data.fullContent: Rice is the staple food of Sierra Leone. It is eaten at nearly every meal daily. The rice is prepared in many ways, and topped with different sauces made from some of Sierra Leone's favorite toppings. These include potato leaves, cassava leaves, crain crain, okra soup, fried fish and groundnut stew.
data.answer: 大米是塞拉利昂的主食。几乎每天每餐都吃。这种米饭的制作方法有很多种，上面撒上不同的酱汁，酱汁是由塞拉利昂人最喜欢的配料制成的。这些包括土豆叶，木薯叶，crain crain，秋葵汤，炸鱼和花生炖。
